thread.title: Tamil Nadu political crisis Live Updates: MK Stalin, other DMK leaders on hunger strike in protest against ruckus in Assembly
thread.title_full: Tamil Nadu political crisis Live Updates: MK Stalin, other DMK leaders on hunger strike in protest against ruckus in Assembly

author: FE Online
title: Tamil Nadu political crisis Live Updates: MK Stalin, other DMK leaders on hunger strike in protest against ruckus in Assembly
text:
India news Tamil Nadu political crisis Live Updates: MK Stalin, other DMK leaders on hunger strike in protest against ruckus in Assembly Tamil Nadu political crisis Live Updates: MK Stalin, other DMK leaders on hunger strike in protest against ruckus in Assembly The political crisis in Tamil Nadu today took to next level today with DMK leaders going on hunger strike today in protest against the ruckus in the state Assembly last Saturday during the Trust vote of new Chief Minister E Palaniswami. By: FE Online | Chennai | Updated: February 22, 2017 10:32 AM DMK’s hunger strike is in protest over recent ruckus in Tamil Nadu Assembly. (ANI) 
The political crisis in Tamil Nadu took to next level today with DMK leaders going on hunger strike today in protest against the ruckus in the state Assembly last Saturday during the Trust vote of new Chief Minister E Palaniswami. The fast in Trichy is also to protest the alleged manhandling of the party Treasurer Stalin in the state Assembly on February 18 when the trust vote was taken up. The opposition DMK had submitted a letter to Tamil Nadu Assembly Secretary AMP Jamaludeen for a No-Confidence Motion against Speaker P Dhanapal. The DMK’s move came a day after party Working President and Leader of Opposition in the Assembly MK Stalin said his party will move a No-Confidence Motion against the Speaker in the backdrop of the February 18 trust vote which Chief Minister E K Palaniswami won with a 122-11 margin. 
10:08 AM: DMK’s hunger strike protest over recent ruckus in Tamil Nadu Assembly underway. Party worling president MK Stalin also present.
